arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah bidding to equal Daniel Sturridge Liverpool record in Merseyside derby
arts.sum: Liverpool winger Mohamed Salah could equal a Reds record set by Daniel Sturridge when Arne Slot's side take on Everton in Saturday's Premier League Merseyside derby.

arts.ttl: Daniel Peretz: Who is Bayern Munich's Israeli goalkeeper ready to face Heidenheim?
arts.sum: Daniel Peretz has had to bide his time since joining Bayern Munich from Maccabi Tel Aviv in 2023, but Israel's new main man is set to come into focus as he lines out for the Bavarian giants against Heidenheim this weekend. Peretz made his Bayern debut in the first round of the 2023/24 DFB Cup against Preu√üen M√ºnster and kept a clean sheet in a 4-0 win while making three saves .
